definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

pinyin: Ai4 de2 hua2 · Da2 la1 di4

definition: Prince Edward Island, province of Canada

pinyin: Ai4 de2 hua2 Wang2 zi3 Dao3

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, Edward was very fond of cooking and foodstuff.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，爱德华非常喜欢烹饪和食品。

sentences.english: He spoke out against the excesses of King Edward II.
sentences.chinese: 他公然反对国王爱德华二世的暴政。

sentences.english: The wedding of Prince Edouard and his bride was a far more low-key affair however with only a few hundred people turning out onto the streets to watch them.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华王子的婚礼低调得多，仅有几百人沿街观看。

sentences.english: Edward always gets heebie jeebies from deadlines.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华总是对截止日期神经过敏。

sentences.english: The Rising Sun was the badge of Edward III.
Every time I watched this movie, my tears welled up in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 在看《剪刀手爱德华》时，泪水模糊了我的视线。

sentences.english: I acquit Edward of all essential misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 我原谅爱德华的所有根本过错。

sentences.english: The same applies to pressure ulcers, says Edwards.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华兹说这同样适用于压力溃疡。

sentences.english: Mrs. Ferrars can never forget that Edward is her son.
sentences.chinese: 费拉斯太太决不会忘记爱德华是她的儿子。

sentences.english: Q. I was wondering if Bella had any other interests besides Edward?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道贝拉除了爱德华之外有没有其他兴趣呢？

sentences.english: The Regent broke the connection and Edwards sat there, his head swimming.
sentences.chinese: 瑞金特切断了连线，爱德华兹坐在那里，头晕目眩。

sentences.english: Edward wilkerson, center, presides over one of his many dinner parties.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华威克森，中心，可用来主持宴会。

sentences.english: Will Edward get the contract ready for signature?
sentences.chinese: 爱德华会把合同准备签好字吗？

sentences.english: The Vedels were Laura's parents and Edouard's close friends.
sentences.chinese: 维德尔夫妇是劳拉的父母，也是爱德华的好友。

sentences.english: Edward was drifted to an isolated island.
sentences.chinese: 山洪从山上流下来，爱德华被冲到一个孤岛。

sentences.english: Edward struck first, and overwhelmed the younger de Montfort.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华首先开战，并打败了年轻的孟福尔。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
